name: ClockAround
description:
Become a sky pirate, and enter the ultimate pillage experience in ClockAround!

Collect as many golden gears as you can, but be careful not to die horribly in the process.

The arena changes over time, following the ticking of a great clock on the bell tower. The more you progress, the more difficult it becomes!

Submission for the 24 hours game jam: The New Year Jam but we Actually do it!

CONTROLS:

WASD : MOVE

SPACE: JUMP

LEFT CLICK: AIR DASH (only when jumping)

CREDITS:

PROGRAMMERS:
